t: Exposed: Amazon's enormous and rapidly growing plastic pollution problem | Oceana

t: Why Bioplastics Will Not Solve the World’s Plastics Problem - Yale e360
s: Bioplastics are being touted by industry marketers as the solution to plastics pollution. But the idea that bottles and packaging made of plant-based material can simply be discarded and then break down and disappear is false – recycling and reuse are the only strategies that can work.
